attributes.action: change the right for the wearing of   PIGAT JASA MALAYSIA   MEDAL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE the people that were awarded the PJM medal.... from MALAYSIAN govenment ask you to change your mind about permision to be able to wear it with pride....  Because it was this govenment that sent us to help them... we think that it is a insult to that govenment for you to deny us that right

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "change the right for the wearing of PIGAT JASA MALAYSIA MEDAL."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15221.asp

Prime Minister's Office
